
ghc -O2 bench/VectorsBench.pass-0000.opt.hs  && bench/VectorsBench.pass-0000.opt  --regress allocated:iters +RTS -T -RTS --csv VectorsBench.csv

ghc -O2 -fforce-recomp -ddump-to-file -ddump-prep bench/VectorsBench.pass-0000.opt.hs


ghc -O2 VectorsBench.hs && ./VectorsBench --regress allocated:iters +RTS -T -RTS  --csv VectorsBench.csv

ghc -O2 -fforce-recomp -ddump-to-file -ddump-prep VectorsBench.hs
